description: Baldy Bounce is a 3D platforming adventure game with collectables, mini-games, character customisation, and much more.

name: Dose Response
description: Dose Response is a roguelike game where you play an addict. Avoid the dangers threatening your mind and body while desperately looking for the next fix.

name: Emancipator Go!
description: Go free your besieged home planet... all by yourself! Emancipator Go! is a survival game with roguelite elements.

name: As Above So Below
description: As Above So Below is a Survival Horror Open World Action/RPG. You play as a recent college graduate offered a job in a small town, but upon arrival things are not what they seem. Face a series of unexplained events that unravel history, and ultimately change the future. Explore, Fight, Survive.

name: Total Factory
description: You are a robot with unrealistically advanced artificial intelligence on a previously unknown planet, people created you for one single purpose - to ensure the automatic production of the necessary resources and their dispatch. It would seem that what could go wrong?

name: Unmaker
description: Unmaker is a survival roguelite where your skills will be put to the test. Exterminate thousands of enemies in dark dungeons, unlock dozens of unique skills & weapons and make your way through darkness.

name: Grace Hopper: Bug Rescue
description: Grace Hopper: Bug Rescue is a colourful puzzle game about finding bugs (insects and coding errors).

name: Guild of Dragons
description: Your settlement-builder with dragon taming. Raise your dragons and build a thriving settlement. Enjoy city-building, dragon taming, exploration, and conquest in a magical world.

name: Barbarian
description: Low poly survival game, with a souls like combat system, where you can dodge, block, and parry attacks. Craft items, build homes, level up, and gear your character to get ready to defeat bosses.

name: Gachi Adventure: Billy's Legacy
description: Gachi Adventure: Billy's Legacy is a truly open-world role-playing game. You will find a diverse plot with a unique atmosphere of Gachimuchi, a whole city available for free study, and intense card battles.

name: Squids: Battle Arena
description: Blast, dodge and survive in fully destructible arenas against 2-4 friends. Collect 100+ power ups with weapons and abilities to shrink your enemies to bits while growing to become the last squid standing!

name: Mortal Crux
description: Mortal Crux is an action RPG set in a sprawling medieval world. Alone or with a party up to 4 players, venture from the warmth of your cozy cottage and explore a mysterious frozen land. Take on quests, meet eccentric characters, and survive brutal combat in this homage to ARPGs of the early 2000s.

name: Data Break
description: Data Break is a darkly humorous RPG, inspired by games like Earthbound, Undertale and LISA: The Painful. You play as an office drone who lives a seemingly ordinary life, but something isn't right... A mysterious stranger will soon set into motion a series of events that gradually reveal the horrifying truth...

name: Phantasm
description: Phantasm is an atmospheric episodic adventure game that allows the player to traverse between memories using a system called Observe OS.

name: Alienate!: A Trivia Game
description: Alienate! is a social deduction trivia game for 2 to 12 players. Each player is either an Alien competing to win the big showcase (Planet Earth) on a Space Game Show - or an Earthling, who infiltrated the game show in an effort to save their planet. Over 200 trivia questions with

name: Shoot to Kill
description: Shoot To Kill is a single player retro-FPS inspired by the violence and pace of shooters of the past. Take on hordes of soldiers and experiments created by an authoritarian military group in the dystopian future of 2140.

name: Cyber Dungeonz RPG
description: Cyber Dungeonz RPG is hack'n'slash detective crpg with interesting plot, awesome music and cyberpunk atmosphere. You are a member of an underground hacker group operating in our dark future.

name: Candy Bar
description: Candy bar is a dating simulator with a set of mini-games. You ended up in a new city thanks to a candy store inherited from a wealthy relative. Meet the locals, invite them to your new store and treat them to candies.

name: Bill's adventure: Alien war
description: Bill's adventure: Alien war is a 2D platform game with shooting elements in which you'll fight to end an interplanetary war between robots and aliens in a futuristic world where humans have gone extinct.

name: Enthrean Radiance: The First Strike
description: Enthrean Radiance: The First Strike is a 2D action-RPG that invokes the feeling of classic Japanese games. Help Millia and Razh to save the world of Enthrean from chaos!

name: Bubbbles
description: Bubbbles is a casual VR puzzle game where you'll need to get to the core of a pile of bubb(b)les! Match the correct color / texture bubbles to remove all similar touching bubbles while more fly in from the sky to throw you off.

name: ASMR Food Experience
description: If you are looking for tones that will put you in an amazing mood, you've come to the right place! In ASMR Food Experience, we have connected the game with the tones of the world around us. Open, manage and listen to your own restaurant!

name: Roll on Dice
description: Roll On Dice is a puzzle game where you have to roll on other dices! Learn your own dice, to determine if your top face number will be superior or equal to the one that you are rolling on, otherwise you will break your own…

name: Peregrine
description: After escaping from an inevitable death you have been chosen to wield the Desolation Blade. While wielding it you can bring justice to those who brought death and destruction to earth and enslaved mankind.

name: Dodge the Missionaries
description: How long can you run from God?!

name: Dire Fog: Tactical Card Combat
description: Dire Fog combines the best of PVP turn based tactical combat and PVP deck building games. Construct a deck and then play it out on a grid, moving cards into position to outwit your opponent. There are no shuffling or random effects in the game, victory is only possible if you outplay your enemy.

name: High Poly: Rise of the Machines
description: Prevent the disassembly of your World, unite the Five Realms, and bring the battle to your Oppressor. Hack and Smash your way through medieval conspiracies and mechanical invaders as you uncover the truth behind this world.

name: Mothership
description: Mothership is a "space haiku", a dreamy science-fiction adventure. It is a pathfinding-sim where you will explore exotic and treacherous exoplanets to recover the cores of huge space wrecks.

name: Brawler Bots!
description: Dungeon clearing + pvp , in a world of robots. Fully customize your own robot to hack & slash your way through virus infected bots, Save the world, then take that gear into PVP and test your metal against the top players in a competitive environment! Do you have what it takes to be #1?

name: Broken Build Simulator
description: Love roguelites? Well so do I! So I made a game that combines them all, with modes like 20 Minutes Till Lunch and Vampire Revivers. Blast away at ridiculous monsters in this highly detailed and accurate simulation of what playing a video game is like.

name: The Antarctic Sphere
description: The Antarctic Sphere is a sci-fi narrative game in which you decipher an unknown language in order to communicate with a mysterious sphere that has been found under the ice of Antarctica.

name: Cryogenesis
description: An exploration, mystery and science fiction game in which you must discover who you are and why you woke up in the future where the human race has apparently become extinct. Solve puzzles, use firearms and properly manage your inventory for your survival.

name: Biomes: Survival Era
description: Your last memory is a bright, glistening light in the water ... then you woke up in a world in which primates never existed and you are fighting for your life.

name: Emergency: Road Services Simulator
description: Take a part in car repair missions on the roads. Grow your small business into the best roadside assistance in the town. Help customers in need and save their cars from breaking down. Emergency Road Services Simulator will teach you how to deal with minor and major car breakdowns.

name: Chorizo
description: Fight side by side and head to head with claw, fang, and a whole lot of bad attitude in Chorizo, a multiplayer wrestling fighter. Play in 2-4 player PvP; or take the fight online with seamless rollback netcode. Hop into the ring and fight to be La Correa's top street dog.

name: Unshaken
description: Plan your strategy, prepare your defenses, and lead your band of warriors in epic VR fantasy battles.

name: ClayTown Horror
description: Well, welcome to ClayTown Horror. This here is a single-player horror game with a focus on story, and puzzles. You can expect an strange art style and chilling atmosphere, as well as intriguing riddles and puzzles throughout. Be sure to keep a eye out; you may find something we haven't.

name: Lovely Plains
description: Embark on a wholesome adventure through the lively town of Lovely Plains. You'll find all kinds of oddball characters that need your help. Practice your helpfulness, puzzle- and mystery-solving abilities, and enjoy your time in town.

name: Firesoul
description: Answer the prayers of lost souls, exorcise dark spirits and solve puzzles to uncover the mystery of a forgotten island.

name: Randomish
description: Simple Arcade style challenging Multiplayer games

name: Pizza Kidd
description: Kidd Games presents: an all new, stylish, combat driven 2-D beat-em-up set in a dark sci-fantasy world - featuring uniquely drawn 16-bit pixel art with an aesthetic heavily inspired by 90's anime, graphic novels, and quarter munching arcade brawlers.

name: Defend Homeland
description: "Defend Homeland" is a first-person shooting fantasy defense games, will play a medieval archers, in order to survive in this cruel world can only beat back the enemy.

name: Star Spectre
description: Star Spectre is a single player space combat game with tons of exploration and numerous RPG elements. You will be free to explore and trade, as well as fight in a vast galaxy.

name: Conniption: Paranoia
description: Follow the story of a (mostly) silent protagonist on his journey through a sector of Hell known as the Spirit World to stop an emperor's revival - all while facing off against hordes of monsters. Your toolset? Your bare hands and experimental technology that's still due for quality control testing.

name: Animal Diner
description: Run and expand a Diner while serving different animals their favorite dish. Play alone or up with three other players. Either play in campaign mode and build up your Diner over time, play quick missions and ever more challenging scenarios or go Chef to Chef in the versus mode.

name: Big Hops
description: Big Hops is a fresh and froggy action-platformer focused on deep movement and emergent gameplay! Use parkour and your tongue to explore 8 huge, colorful worlds full of charming animal friends. Discover a huge range of surprising, playful interactions with gadgets and veggies!

name: Pixiescape
description: Each match, players will play as fairy & robot. Fairies must survive as long as possible. Robots capture fairies as quickly as possible. Both teams will have unique abilities at their disposal. Once all fairies are captured, the players will switch roles. The team with the best survival time wins.

name: Netcorter: City 2179
description: Netcorter: City 2179 is a sci-fi storytelling third-person shooter(TPS) with a cyberpunk aesthetic and Bullet Hell and Roguelite elements. You would become a Netcorter (S-class hacker) and dive into a chain of events that followed the disaster in 2178.

name: Morgue Rot: The Coroner's Quest
description: Inspired from the metal magazine! The Coroner's Quest is a horror RPG influenced by metal for metal-heads! Play as the coroner and uncover some gruesome events which lead you on a path to putting a stop to the ultimate evil and saving the town of St. Anne. If you can stop the morgue rot!!

name: The Bakerville Case
description: Get ready for a first-person horror, adventure and survival experience, enter the darkness and enjoy incredible graphics generated in real time with the Unity engine. Play as Thomas Baker and explore Bakerville to discover the terrible evil that resides there.

name: Holo Arena: Death League
description: Holo Arena: Death League takes the ancient gladiator fights to be the main sport of the future, in an intense MOBA TPS battle.

name: Louny Balloony
description: Fly through the exciting skies in this unique side-scrolling platformer! Collect balloons and feathers to gain the ability of flight as you navigate dazzling landscapes and face off against surprising obstacles and enemies during your aerial journey across the world!

name: Keyfall
description: Keyfall is an unique competitive experience for both beginner and expert level typewriters, with different single player and multiplayer game modes. Players are able to compete for place in both global and country ranking leaderboards!

name: Coffeehouse
description: Have you ever dreamed of owning a small place where you can sell coffee, tea, and cake to your lovely customers? Coffeehouse is exactly that! Take care of customer orders, make coffee, resolve customers problems and lose yourself in this first-person management game!

name: Astro Knight
description: Astro Knight is a Single-player Synthwave Smash-inspired Space Adventure. Wield your sword through a stylized dream world as you battle swarms of monsters. But throughout your journey you'll have to deal with the loss of your favorite move each stage. Can you let go?

name: Lucky Heroes
description: Find A single card which leads you to the victory. Lucky Heroes is a very simple and easy card game. Explore and manipulate decks with 20 unique characters.

name: Kasaba
description: "Kasaba" is a life simulation game set in the medieval period. You can work in various jobs, specialize in them, trade, marry and get rich in different ways. The possibilities are endless in a procedurally generated limitless world.

name: Kaiju Commander
description: Kaiju Commander is a strategy game where your main task is to dominate the whole world. To achieve this goal, you will be managing an evil corporation that breeds powerful monsters known as Kaiju. Develop your underwater base, gather resources, and dominate the world!

name: Karl Marx and the Ring of Communism
description: Workers of the world, unite! You have nothing to loose, but, like, less than two dollars. - Karl Marx... would probably say about this challenging platformer. Play as the great thinker, overcome capitalism and return the world to the one righteous state of universal, common, great and equal poverty.

name: Evil Next Door
description: Evil Next Door is a game about survival in a small post-Soviet town called Ensk suffering from a deadly epidemic. Switch between characters, go out for supplies and build a shelter for your people.

name: Galaxi Taxi
description: Galaxi Taxi is a hybrid of Story-Driven Action-Adventure, Shoot’em and Boss Fight, and you’re a taxi crew in the classy 90s animation art style. Drive your taxi and discover the depths of a rural outer space, a muddy milky way, a cosmic dust flooding the taxi and an ubiquitous smog.

name: Future Reality: Racing League
description: Race high speed bio-refuse shells through a dark future ruled by omni-corps and overrun with fleshy abominations. Racing Horror from Future Reality Softworks.

name: Sektori
description: Sektori is an intense, fast paced twin-stick shooter where every run is unique. Choose your upgrades carefully and create powerful builds to take on numerous enemies and epic bosses on a constantly evolving battlefield.

name: Bura: The Way the Wind Blows
description: Explore the beautiful Adriatic coast, live as part of a small community and roam among the spirits of Mediterranean old-folk tales. Level up your character and make meaningful choices as the legends you're told come to life. Every decision is important, truth or lie, it is on you to decide.

name: Nenneman: The Game
description: Nenneman: The Game is a Pixelart-Sidescroller by Vinni Richburgh, in which you can play as one of a few local heroes (first and foremost Nenneman) on their mission to stop evil spirits from destroying their beloved hometown. Will they succeed? Who knows...

name: Forfeit
description: Forfeit is inspired by real events that are tried to be hidden; It is a game of thrill, adventure and mystery. In this game, you may find yourself in Nevada's mysterious Area 51 or jump to another dimension. Come on, start the game! This story is yours.

name: Incaved
description: In Incaved you play as one of many Russian civilians taking shelter in ever expanding cave systems after nukes were dropped. With limited supplies, oxygen and sunlight, survivors become hostile. The question raises whether it's safer down here in the caves, or up there, in the radiated wastelands.

name: Meridian
description: Meridian is a persistent, open-world, multi-player, roleplaying sandbox. It features an infinite, procedurally generated universe which players are free to explore without restriction. Meridian is more than a game, it is a world.

name: Dungene
description: Dungene is a Roguelite Action Sci-Fi game. The bioexperiments that you will go through in the game will test your skill in hack and slash, or maybe 2D Pinball (or pure luck)?

name: Metasweeper
description: Explore a strange rectilinear land full of strange rectilinear life. Find new abilities that unlock new areas and complement your clearing and flagging. And discover more depth than you ever thought possible from a game based on minesweeper.

name: Skylark
description: In this action-adventure game, you are an ex-mafia member who seeks revenge for the death of your best friend. Receive upgrades when defeating mafia bosses. Throughout the game, you can upgrade your powers and decide to either take over the city or free it from anyone of high power.

name: Glory of the Arena
description: Amuse the audience to be the ultimate warrior. Fight with style. Show your skill. Never hold back. The entertainment is far more important than a kill. Gather the audience on your streaming platform and let them decide your fate!

name: Necropolis Suite
description: Necropolis Suite, is an immersive narrative-driven cosmic horror game about discovery, knowledge, and the meaning of transcendence. Can you escape the terror that lurks in the suite?

name: Curl!
description: The beloved and captivating sport is spreading to new worlds! Take up the broom to challenge your friends locally or online to a competition of wit, teamwork, and silliness in this first-of-its-kind game, built for accessibility with brain-computer interface integration.

name: Ultra Mega Cats
description: Ultra Mega Cats is a high-paced roguelike cooperative third-person shooter. As a player, you control one of the Mega Cats, armed to the fangs, escaping their corporate prison.

name: Colossal Citadels
description: A fantasy strategy, featuring turn-based factory building over procedural resource types. Expand and optimize your network of towns, grow your heroes, and excel in deep tactical seamless auto-battler combat.

name: Dreamed
description: Dreamed is an experimental, surreal first-person puzzle game with non-puzzle elements in-between.

name: Seekers Aeterna
description: After a mysterious global cataclysm, the last few surviving humans wake up in the disconnected remains of a foreign gothic fantasy world. Take part in epic battles, befriend a colorful cast of characters and explore an interconnected Vania-Like world.

name: Bitter
description: Play as the Sourman as you venture through the hostile jungles in this Retro-FPS Platformer!

name: Shadows in the Dark
description: Shadows in the dark is a short roguelike game with frantic action. Defeat the horde of enemies, collect coins to improve your skills Collect the diamonds to activate the holy statue. There are four automatically generated areas to leave your even more interesting gameplay.

name: Enoch: Children of fate
description: The year is 2179. What's left of mankind has been fleeing an unknown menace for 100 years. Take control of multiple characters with overlapping storylines in this Scifi noir point&click adventure game ! Help them face their personnal struggles as greater events unfold aboard Enoch Space Station.

name: A Star of Chrome
description: A top down Action-Adventure inspired by 16bit and 8bit handheld games. Explore the Martian frontier, while searching for your lost dog and uncover the mysterious cause of a day that never ends.

name: Kamakazzzbee
description: Kamakazzzbee is a tiny yet taxing arcade game about a belligerent bee, and his testing trial of demolishing all flowers. Weave through horrifically cute pixelated hordes, in hopes to flatten the final flower…

name: Automatrain
description: Automatrain is a game about building automated railroads and industry, in a world governed by an omnipotent AI. Manage production and traffic to unlock more trains, factories and advanced gameplay features.

name: Hollowmoor
description: Grow crops, brew potions and search for mystical creatures in this cozy magic life sim. As a budding Witch or Wizard you’ll also befriend and date the townsfolk as you bring magic back to the town of Hollowmoor!

name: Eye For Blood
description: Eye For Blood is a dark and gritty detective game set in 1978, it's focus lies in letting the player solve everything themselves.

name: Gem Venture
description: Jump, dash, and mine your way through obstacles and enemies in this platforming tribute to the classics. Restore the Sacred Gems of Aventurine, or else it will become a land of nothingness.

name: Immortal: And the Death that Follows
description: Develop your own unique fighting style, form your own gang and fight your inner demon while trying to escape an interdimensional prison for demigods. Immortal is a rogue-like side-scrolling beat-em-up inspired by fighting games and 90s anime.

name: Naval Hurricane
description: Turn based tactical game about war at sea between British Royal Navy and Imperial German Navy during World War I. Command powerful dreadnoughts, fast destroyers and stealthy submarines, conduct artillery battles, torpedo attacks and fight for the survivability of damaged ships.

name: Distorted Echos
description: After crashing into an Alien planet called Yolk, You find yourself oblivious and left alone with your AI companion , Find your way through the unknown ,Discover the mysteries of Yolk and find out what happened to you and everyone else.

name: Build and Discover: America
description: Build and Discover: America is a mixture of real-time strategy game genres combined with a country building simulation and strong economic elements, all based on the history of the USA.

name: Lunars
description: Gather your friends for the zodiac party game where chaos meets competition! Up to 4 local and 8 online players can customize characters, conquer mini-games, and outsmart rivals with items and power-ups. With 3 game modes—including one where everyone plays at the same time—it’s non-stop fun!

name: Bourbon Empire
description: Organized crime real-time strategy set in New York City during prohibition. Using the illegal bootlegging trade, running various rackets, warring with other 'families', and bribing police, you can build an criminal empire.

name: Trash Magnate
description: An open world recycling tycoon game. Explore the 3d environment collecting garbage and converting it to raw resources. Complete quests and unlock upgrades as you expand your waste management empire.

name: Hellvivors
description: Hellvivors is a survival roguelike inspired by Binding of Isaac and Vampire Survivors. Face hordes of hellish creatures, level up, choose cards and make crazy broken builds to survive this hell.

name: Lurk and Rouse
description: With the call of duty, the sleeping soldiers will be awakened to steal secret documents, assassinate enemy leaders, rescue their comrades, at the cost of their own lives, but for the revolution!It was all worth it!

name: Eonwar
description: Comfortably paced, match-based strategy with a PvE twist, contrasted with intense physics-based combat. Take direct control of tanks, infantry and ships across space and planetside. Manage your powerful deck of commanders and battle with up to 6 players! Will you rule or unite Omega Centauri?

name: Through the Abyss
description: Join the protagonist in his adventure through a mysterious place called the Abyss. Explore unique and tough environments with hundreds of hand crafted levels!

name: The Spirit Lift
description: The Spirit Lift is a deck-building rogue-like horror adventure in a haunted hotel. Ascend 13 floors in a ghostly elevator. Use equipment cards to battle monsters. Make it to the villain at the top… or die trying!

name: Steel Wound
description: A fast-paced and violent action game with light rpg-elements, inspired by an old Amiga classic. Fight monsters inspired by Japanese folklore, earn experience and money, upgrade your character, and take on more challenges. Play solo, or with up to four players in hotseat or online.

name: Dash Out
description: A music-based game where you dash through the levels and complete rhythmic challenges

name: Allakin
description: Help Allakin find his way back home and defeat the dark force in many varied levels

name: Star Exodus
description: Be ready to wander around the endless space, where you have to fight for resources, manage them and take care of your crew. Star Exodus will take you on a journey through barren space and put your survival skills to the test!

name: Duncade
description: Duncade is a 2D, Action-RPG, Roguelite, based on the old arcade machines. Go on your quest to defeat as many enemies as possible! Claim the highest of scores! Smash slimes to bits! Crisp demonic sandcastles! Adore the cute cat snowballs!

name: Road to Vostok
description: Road to Vostok is a hardcore single-player survival game set in a post-apocalyptic border zone between Finland and Russia. Survive, loot, plan and prepare your way across the Border Zone and enter the Vostok.

name: Boom Shocketa: Rocket Storm
description: Boom Shocketa: Rocket Storm brings true 6DoF (six degrees of freedom) rocket racing to your PC. Blast faster than ever before in a game designed for those who are never satisfied with their record times.

name: Star in the Hollow
description: A young girl who finds herself alone in a massive cave with no memory of how she arrived there. Aided by a mysterious talking bird, she must find her way out of the cave, and hopefully, return to a family that she can’t even remember.

name: Epsilon Eridana
description: Epsilon Eridana is a story-driven sci-fi survival horror with a heavy focus on exploration. Your goal is to investigate what happened to the crew of abandoned space base and unravel the terryfying secrets of the first extraterrestrial contact.

name: Ms Jenkins Estate
description: Mrs Jenkins Estate - This is a first-person psychological horror game. An old mansion has some blood-curdling secrets, which have been kept for too long…Bursting out, the secrets plunge you into the whirlpool of chilling horror: a constant sense of another presence, dark and scary atmosphere.

name: Disco Tomb
description: Disco Tomb is a sci-fi retro FPS / boomer shooter made just like the good ol' days! Use magic spells and guns to fight your way through huge waves of enemies in freaky dungeons or out in the open desert against the hordes of the invaders! Oblivion awaits!

name: RPG Town
description:
RPG Town is a lighthearted management sim where you run a small fantasy-game town, converting local businesses to serve rowdy adventurers!

These adventurers are looking for typical RPG stuff - shops to stock up before the next big dungeon, an Inn to rest at or maybe grab a pint... but as time passes, they get impatient... Your grandmother's beautiful earthen-ware vase? They'll smash it. They'll ransack your house for pocket change. They'll drive everybody in town nuts. So what are you gonna do about it?

name: Death Walk
description: The world is different. The virus has changed people, they are alive, well I think. they have become canibal. I don't understand, am I too infested? can mankind still be saved?

name: Shootin' Gallery VR
description: Keep pulling the trigger to save your soul! This is Shootin' Gallery!

name: Fracture In Space
description: Unarmed, tired and alone, discover what happened in this strange world and find a way to escape the planet. Made with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Domains of Dusk
description: Supernatural factions clash over dominance of the city, control exerted from boardrooms and ritual circles, but also reclaimed on the streets and in the underground. Play a new story every game as you lead new factions, new characters and overcome new supernatural challenges. Take the city!

name: Selfpolis
description: What will happen if anxieties overwhelm a human so much they burst into a real-world like a wave?

name: Farewells
description: The player plays "in-game reality" and "in-game game" to advance the boy's life.

name: Lux Intacta
description: Lux Intacta is a procedurally generated, arcade, shoot 'em up, RPG with the ultimate quest. Collect gems, level up, and equip your ship how you want to become the ultimate space fighter.

name: Hotel Management Simulator
description: Build, renovate and manage your hotel to keep your guests happy. Increase your star rating, but be careful - unhappy guests leave bad reviews and you don't want to lose your hotel!

name: Isoscape
description: A third-person puzzle platformer set in a beautiful, engaging world. Players will learn how to carry and shift colors to solve puzzles.

name: Necroblade
description: Necroblade is a grimdark fantasy adventure with survival and RPG elements. On your way to the heart of the capital, you must explore, scavenge, battle hordes of enemies and upgrade abilities to survive. Which will kill you? The terrible curse or the deadly quest to break it?

name: Farm For A Wife
description: Farm For A Wife is a light farming simulation game. Place plots, plant, grow, harvest, and sell your goods, all spread your farm out wide all to earn the hand of your future Wife!

name: Ineth
description: A pixel-art Metroidvania with challenging platformer mechanics, set in a medieval magical world. Discover a great variety of spells and abilities to defeat enemies and solve puzzles. Find mythical charms and items to help Ineth fight her way out of her prison.

name: Far From Dead
description: Run and gun boss rush action.

name: Cave Quest 3
description: Return to the underground city with the brave traveler Johan. Explore a vast world, upgrade your equipment, complete hundred of new Match-3 levels and solve the last mystery of the lost city.

name: Rubber
description: Roll as far as possible. Destroy as much as possible. Realistic physics and a procedurally generated worlds filled with bonuses and destructible obstacles are ready to challenge your Tire rolling skills!

name: Go Nutz
description: Bounce through forests delivering nutz to fellow squirrels as you tail-slap and gun down swarms of insects and woodland creatures. Discover what's disrupting the usual balance of nature.

name: Arid Jared
description: A lone cactus sets out to save his desert and his friends. Take down bosses, gain and spend experience points, and uncover the mysteries of the desert in this whacky Arcade/RPG hybrid title.

name: Car Scrapyard Simulator
description: Disassembling a car into parts and selling them later is nothing difficult for you, after all, you are the owner of a cars' scrapyard - and this is Car Scrapyard Simulator! Expand your headquarters full of broken and used cars. Manage your empire - a scrap empire!

name: Terra Maega
description: Congratulations! You're finally an Apprentice Mage; you're one step closer to becoming a Master. Travel the land forging relationships, crafting magical items, taking on quests, and having magical duels; all with the help of your cute magical familiars. Can you become a Master Mage in just 4 years?

name: Drug Dealer Manager
description: Build your drug empire in an isometric crime tycoon game. Hire dealers and create supply chains. Avoid or bribe the officials. Spy and fight your competition to take over city districts. Command in real-time with active pause. Be the cartel king!

name: Cerebrum Operation
description: Make wise decisions in this turn-based tactical game in a world at war. Upgrade your squads with new equipment and skills. Build camps and outposts to ensure your soldiers never run out of supplies. Will you survive and conquer the whole city ? Only you can make the difference in Cerebrum Operation!

name: Let It Boom
description: Let it Boom is a VR sandbox where you visit different surreal worlds in a van and destroy your surroundings. Blow up entire buildings and smash objects using a baseball bat and your best allies - bombs!

name: Gothica: The Devil's Shadow
description: Gothica: The Devil's Shadow is a single player, steampunk-influenced, adventure puzzle game designed for VR. You'll need ingenuity to tackle the physical puzzles, eyes in the back of your head to spot the dangers and lighting reactions to fight off the Dark Lord's minions.

name: NEG: The Threefold Cord
description: Join NEG and Buddy on their journey to return the stolen scrolls and save their village. In this precision platformer you will face many daring challenges. Overcome the challenges and defeat all the bosses to fix The Threefold Cord.

name: Mayhem
description: Hunt down waves of vampiric freaks with friends or on your own in this brutal but fair horde roguelike fps. Explore, upgrade and find secrets to overcome the intensifying challenges thrown at you by a future that never was. Shoot, die, repeat.

name: Best Election Simulator In Russia!
description: Who is your admiral general communist oligarch in the bright Russia of the future? Putin? Trump? Navalny?

name: Evergreen: Mountain Life Simulator
description: Evergreen is a simulation game about leaving the stress of the city behind and starting a new life in a mountain valley.

name: Ill Ness
description: "Ill Ness" was inspired by Stephen King’s science fiction horror novel called Dreamcatcher.

name: Cat Cafe Simulator
description: Build and manage the cat café of your dreams! Find new forever-homes for abandoned cats, and serve food to customers to earn money for expanding and decorating your café!

name: Days of Despair
description: Explore the Wall who divided civilization and take it down.

name: Daybreak
description: You are a rogue gun-for-hire that has been contracted to deploy into an outbreak zone to uncover the truth of a widespread pandemic. Armed with just your wits & determination, you must fight your way through the horde, befriend local survivors, and fight off the scavengers that lurk in the shadows.

name: AHOD: All Hands on Deck!
description: Build the strongest sailing crew and defeat your opponents in AHOD: All Hands on Deck! This fast-paced deckbuilder game features exciting card gameplay, strategic deck composition, and a variety of powerful weapons and magical loot.

name: Friend on the Go
description: A RPG about making friends. Professional voice acting, original art, original soundtrack!

name: Paradise Homeland
description: Explore the scenic, sandbox experience, where you can build anything you can imagine, move to the large, open land of Paradise Homeland!

name: Maze City: A Cyberpunk Lost and Found Centre
description: Maze City: A Cyberpunk Lost and Found Centre is a game that simulates the life of a wage slave in a lost and found centre of the future cyberpunk city. Go experience life and seek the truth by chatting, returning lost items, trading and playing card games.

name: UFObia
description: UFOBIA is a cooperative horror game for 1 to 4 players who need to solve puzzles and face beings from another planet.

name: Gun and Buckler
description: Shoot and deflect bullets as a frog equipped with a gun, a buckler and a sticky tongue.

name: Forklift Flowerpot
description: Change between three seasons on a strange archipelago to solve puzzles, quiet-quit your forklift job, and dismantle the potato-dominated shipping industry. When you're done exploring, kick back and play a deckbuilding card game in a wild attempt to dethrone your local Gods.

name: Isotope: ASH
description: Isotope: ASH is a cyber-dystopian adventure RPG, an homage to the Megaman Battle Network series, with updated deck-building and combat mechanics. Build your deck with powerful shards, utilizing powerful compression combos in battle to turn the tide in your favor!

name: Glyde the Dragon
description: Witness an epic story as Glyde and Wing set out on an adventure to find out the cause of mysterious corruption! Use 8 elemental forms with more than 60 different abilities! Explore the world, collect crystals, save other dragons and gain more insight into the story as you progress!

name: Escape the Mad Empire
description: Enjoy a unique kind of roguelike party-based tactical RPG that features real-time combat with actions on pause and management/base-building elements. Explore the various apocalypses caused by the Mad Empire. Will your next journey be a glorious victory or an epic failure?

name: IMC
description: A realtime, roguelike, card game. Traverse planets, build decks and earn riches while battling to the extraction point. Some will make it, most will die...

name: Infinitevania
description: Explore different worlds, defeat enemies and challenging bosses, in search of power to destroy the core of infinitevania.

name: Aurora Chronicles
description: Aurora Chronicles is a 2D side-scrolling survival action game where you play as a Demon Rogue Bounty Hunter named Aurora, you must survive against waves of enemies who are out to destroy and kill you, utilize your rogue skillset to see how long you can survive in the world of Orellia

name: Ecoplanet
description: Ecoplanet is a Tycoon Eco-Sim that lets you research, breed and build ecosystems whilst creating an island tour business to become the richest island owner around! Unlock new animals, plants and scenic props to create exciting islands and bring more customers!

name: Particle of God
description: Particle of God is a post-apocalyptic indie RPG with Survival elements, an open world and tactical battles.

name: Hexmet World
description: In Hexmet World you can create your ideal world, build your strategy, attack the enemy, and enjoy the beauty of the created places!

name: Dual Gunstrike
description: Dual Gunstrike is a 100-Mega Shock!/32-bit inspired horizontal shmup. Choose between 4 heroes and blast into space to stop a mysterious multi-dimensional creature from destroying humanity!

name: AV.Runner
description: AV.Runner is a relaxing yet speedy first-person platformer experience, with a focus on player freedom and customization.

name: Gawr Gura: Quest for Bread
description: An interdimensional, time-traveling, action-platforming adventure game featuring everyone's favorite shark.

name: Feelings
description:
Feelings is a puzzle story-driven game that follows the adventures of Sarah, a young adult girl who lost her sense of self after years battling against anxiety and depression without seeking aid.

Sarah is trapped inside her mind and needs help of her younger self to face the challenges that her memories and feelings bring to her. A new light is shed upon old problems and relationships she lost along the way.

Will Sarah learn to seek help and let other people in to save her? Or will she be forever trapped inside her own mind?

name: Lair Land Story 2: Mist of Sea
description: After traveling far to the southern end of Lair Land, seven knights have reached Chainch Bay. Settled in a small tropical fishing village surrounded by ruins, they will spend the next few years building a new life here while facing the most challenging quest they will ever meet.

name: FallNation
description: FallNation is a free-roaming army based RPG adventure mixing a Worldmap stage and FPS battlefield with Real Time Tactics in the middle of an apocalyptic environment where the future depends on you.

name: Bloodz
description: Bloodz is an indie action game set in a world dominated by zombies.

name: Division
description: Division is a sci-fi adventure game. The whole world became strange, the place we live seem to be falling apart. A girl named YI will embark on an incredible journey.

name: Insane Maze
description: Can you get out of the auto-generation insane maze alone or with friends? The maze is full of useless items for survival, what if they won't help you, but the monsters will overtake you!

name: Last Days
description: Medieval souls like dark fantasy 3d third person action game with supernatural elements.

name: Master Wulder
description: You are Wulder, the future god of archery. Hunt in the forests of Idalir, collect souls. Prove to everyone that you are the best among the gods.

name: Turnip Mountain
description: In this hands-on climbing platformer, chart your own path as you reach, swing and soar to the summit!

name: Electric Car Tycoon
description: In Electric Car Tycoon you get to start the electric car revolution with your own car company. Start with an experimental model in your garage and grow your company to hundreds of factories and workers around the world. Research new technologies and improve your models. Create the best electric car

name: Contract Killer Simulator: Mafia Edition
description: Basing on true story try to recreate historical assassinations on the most notorious gangsters from prohibition period of twenties in the USA. Feel the original and reconstituted in smallest details scenery from those times.

name: Kingdom Knights
description: A indie RPG based on customization, and trying new things! It features a pocket farm and many different ways to explore the world.

name: Island Girl
description: Island Girl is a 3D Visual Novel role-playing game experience. A branching narrative that keeps you engage. Travel the world with Agent Saphira as she investigates the world's mysteries, including what lurks within Hollow Earth.

name: Copcore
description: Cop themed FPS with RPG elements. Become a police officer and fight against the bad guys. Upgrade your equipment and police station. Train your skills to become more efficient and strong at enforcing the law.

name: Natural Spirit
description: Natural Spirit is a third-person adventure game where you will play as the shiba Yukito, to help the spirit Aura to save the tree of life from a certain death that would doom us all.

name: Star Strikers: Galactic Soccer
description: Star Strikers: Galactic Soccer is a beautiful hand-drawn arcade football game, with fast-paced action, unique playfields and crazy characters from all over the universe! Great in single-player, even better with friends.

name: Chaos Crown
description: An RPG Styled Roguelite set in fantasy procedural paths. Craft artifacts, slay legendary monsters and abuse synergies to fulfill the secret goal of your champion. Which one will you choose? We need your feedback before the official launch!

name: Seething Things
description: Seething Things is a horror investigation game where up to four players choose from unique exorcist classes and attempt to expel vengeful ghosts. Carefully gather evidence without angering them and banish them to the hereafter!

name: Pact of Darkness
description: Pact of Darkness is an action game with souls-style hack-n-slash combat. You have been trapped by a contract and have lost your memories, explore and fight against corrupted creatures and find out why you are there.

name: Karvan
description: Karvan is a tactical roguelite game. A gigantic tree grew a few years ago, many are exploring it and exploiting the incredible resources that grow there, be the first to send a caravan all the way up, or die trying

name: Kakuriyo
description: Kakuriyo is an online co-op horror game for 1-4 players. A vindictive ghost seeks a new victim. You and your team members need investigating the distorted world and purifying the curse.

name: Mimic Man
description: Mimic Man is a team based 5v5 multi-player tactical hybrid first/third person shooter. Team up with friends to defeat the opposing team in an ultimate battle of action and wits. Hunters must eliminate mimics quickly, but beware, for mimics will disguise, sabotage and taunt you to stay alive.

name: Destroyed Aperture
description: Aperture Science Experimental Facility #7 is empty. Following the failure of the central core, the complex has been consumed by overgrowth and decay. With the exits sealed, David Grayling is trapped, with no recollection of his past. Will he ever regain his memories and discover the truth?

name: Lights Out
description: Lights Out is a 4v1 multiplayer horror game, where one player takes the role of The Monster, trying to kill the other players of whom are Scientists, trying to escape the facility they're trapped in.

name: Calme
description: This is Calme, a peaceful haven on a precipitous cliff. With a rod in your right hand and a dumpling on the other… This is an action-adventure exploration game set in the town on the cliff, which is more than just a "warm and cozy" place.

name: Miuma
description: Miuma is a cozy game about a little, modest bakery with unexpected twists. The game features the significant feat of Kevin, the bakery’s new owner, and his venture within the middle of nowhere of which he calls his home.

name: Avanzar
description: Avanzar is a fast-paced FPS Roguelike set in an ancient Aztecan temple. Overcome the guardians of the temple by stacking up synergistic weapon upgrades and mastering the advanced movement mechanics in order to reach the heart of the ever-changing temple.

name: Dreamout
description: Explore a surreal world filled with the strangest and most incredible events! You will never know what awaits you around the corner!

name: Roach Raid
description: A disgustingly hilarious indie platformer that follows the story of a rude cockroach attempting to escape a dank and dirty refrigerator by solving simple environmental puzzles and defeating rotten and moldy enemies with slapstick game mechanics and cringeworthy dialogue.

name: Insomnia Jigsaw
description: Insomnia Jigsaw is a relaxing puzzle game accompanied with soothing piano and rain sounds that will make you feel better in just seconds : )

name: Sticking Around
description: Solve puzzles, dodge traps and uncover each room's secrets by changing the camera's angle and perspective in this unique puzzle platformer.

name: King, Witch and Dragon
description: In the game where avatar become weaker and weaker, the player has to become stronger to reach the end.

name: The Sixth Faction
description: The Sixth Faction is a turn-based tactical RPG, optimized for cooperative experience through an innovative scheduling system that allows both players to plan their strategy simultaneously.

name: Hotel Builder
description: Vacations mean various things to people all over the world, but they always have one thing in common: the HOTEL. It’s time to take matters into your own hands and build that dream hotel just the way you always wanted!

name: Meanderer
description: Meanderer is a unique roguelite game set in a world of loss and rebirth. Embark on a pilgrimage with a young monk to make the Sun bright once more. Traverse the ruins of fallen empires, encounter strange endearing characters, and sacrifice your powers as you get closer to fulfilling your purpose.

name: SteamTopia
description: SteamTopia is a casual, steampunk factory-building game, in a time where money and expanding your machines are the only things that matters.

name: Exodus of Souls
description: Gather souls and unleash your wrath on your enemies!

name: Hyde's Haunt & Seek
description: Spook or be spooked in this team-based party game. Set in a haunted manor, the mortal Seekers search for a Prized Possession, playing against a team of pranking poltergeists dead set on keeping it to themselves.

name: Isle Goblin
description: Isle Goblin has been invaded by destructive humans, and complete annihilation of the delicate ecosystem is inevitable. Armed with only your monster friends and the resources available, do you have what it takes to revert the island to its former glory?

name: Apollo Red Moon
description: Apollo Red Moon - is a retro sci fi fast paced shooter. That takes action in alternative history. As a member of Apollo Mission, after successful landing on the moon, you were amubushed and taken prisoner by Soviets who builds military base on the moon.

name: Astro Pirates
description: Space pirate co-op hack-and-slash roguelike flight shooter game-description-salad!

name: Pit Stoppers
description: Fix racing cars with your crewmates in this local co-op game for up to 4 players. Work as quickly as possible, but make sure to do it right. Don't forget - every mishap can turn a race into chaos! Each location offers its own quirks and funny moments that are a great fun for all kinds of players.

name: Electronic Evolution
description: The Imitator Protocol was supposed to be the perfect combat simulation. However, something went wrong, and now you are trapped in the virtual world. Get ready to fight the corrupt Alpha-Imitator in this hand-drawn roguelite inspired by classic superhero comic books.

name: Keyworker Simulator
description: Drive all types of vehicles and have fun around this zombie infested island! Make deliveries for various companies, while looking out for zombies roaming the hillside! Fun with vehicles in an open world... oh and did I mention there are Zombies? What more do you need?!

name: Unlock
description: Into Unlock player have to guess a secret code consisting of a series of 4 unique numbers. Each guest results in feedback narrowing down the code's possibilities. The winner is the player who solves his opponent's secret code with fewer guesses.

name: Best Mall Simulator
description: In the Best Mall Simulator, you’re going to play as a one-man renovating crew and a manager of the, soon to be the best, Mall in the city. Renovating and developing your Mall will be crucial for acquiring retailers and attracting customers.

name: Crimerunner
description: From an errand boy to the big shot – is this possible? Start as a teenage criminal doing menial tasks, skill up, earn respect and make connections. Prove your worth and climb to the top… Parkour style!

name: Eraser
description: Take on the role of a soldier capable of facing the most dangerous enemies, improving your skills to increase the chances of victory

name: Ponder
description: Explore a chill and vibrant world, get to know it inhabitants and yourself. No combat, no puzzles, just good vibes.

name: Flee
description: The leading role is a group of treasure adventure lovers, each to a place to find treasure will be booked in advance a dwelling to rest, but they have no awareness of hidden in the dark a pair of eyes are staring at them, waiting for the opportunity to kill!

name: Drowned
description: Jump your way through a flooded land in Drowned, a 2D side-scrolling platform adventure with atmospheric environments and an immersive world to explore. Join the adventure now!

name: Colors Assemble
description: Help Brad reunite with his family and complete all hand-crafted 2D platform challenges in a colorful twisted world.

name: Midwest 90: Rapid City
description: Midwest 90: Rapid City is a single player, narrative focused survival- tycoon PC game, where the player Builds and Protects their restaurant that serves Monster Meat Dishes.

name: Servants of Sumomon
description: This is a single player roguelike-deckbuilder game. Unlike other games of the genre, player must design every level of the game to survive against the invader. To design levels, player should summon creatures and increase their strength by giving right items.

name: I am Your Lawyer
description: I Am Your Lawyer is a game where you play the role of a lawyer. Your task is to represent your clients in court. You have to defend innocent, harmless people and shady guys (murderers, thieves, crooks). See you in court!

name: Reapertom
description: Reap your out of control crop while avoiding all sorts of creatures and compete for the highest score on the worldwide leaderboard in this fast paced top-down 2D maze arcade style game!

name: The 9th Charnel
description: A first-person survival horror game, The 9th Charnel is filled with a rich and frightening atmosphere. While exploring the many mysteries of this world, you must survive- whether you do it through stealth or by using weapons.

name: Cliffsides
description: Create a place like no other in Cliffsides! In this management simulator, you're in charge of building up a seaside city and then supervising its day-to-day workings. Tourism, industry, and a heap of meticulous space management. All in a charming Mediterranean setting!

name: Farmageddon
description: Farmageddon is a turn-based strategy RPG about farming in the post-apoclayptic desert wastes of New San Fransisco.

name: Happy Lane 403
description: Happy Lane 403 is a first-person psychological horror game set in the nineties in China. Players will play as a child to explore strange things that happen at home and gradually uncover the truth behind the weird events.

name: Dismal Reverie
description: Dismal Reverie is a short FMV puzzle about a woman trying to escape from her reality. Or is it just a dream?

name: Innkeep
description: Innkeep is an immersive job sim with an RPG core and a dark twist. Run your own fantasy world inn. Serve ale. Share rumors. Tell jokes. Rob your guests…?? Well, maybe just a little.

name: Boralaa
description: A turn-based Boss Rush with Souls-like elements: Zero help, just your attention and strategy! Play alone, with and against your friends or community.

name: Neon Cyber Desert
description: Slice through hordes of mutated monsters as you wander the vast post-apocalyptic wastelands. Follow the trail of mysterious obelisks and craft upgrades from scrap metal to unlock your hidden functions. Experience deadly exploration and dynamic combat in a stylized open world!

name: Ejected Star
description: A retro style, sci-fi point n' click Adventure!

name: The Sob Island
description: The Sob Island is a 2D plot puzzle game. The story of Aidan's mysterious death of his mother on his 13th birthday is like the first domino that fell, changing everything he knew.

name: Good Luck, Stay Safe
description: Inspired by classic PC shooters - Fight through hordes of the undead, scavenge for supplies, buy upgrades and uncover secrets.

name: Harvest Mana
description: You have been given the title of farmer at the adventurers guild. Restore the community farm and explore the dungeon of mana while improving your relationship with the local villagers.

name: Curse of Argion
description: Curse of Argion is a randomly generated, rogue-like, dungeon crawler in which a small hero must climb a tower full of dangerous traps and enemies to fight a curse that threatens to infect the world of Argion.

name: Unlitten
description: Unlitten is a singleplayer (soon to be multiplayer) horror game in which the chosen survivor tries to escape zombie-like creatures and learns more about his past.

name: Guardians of Gridvale
description: Push enemies into water or set them on fire. Use the environment and smart positioning in this tactical, turn based roguelike. Enemies telegraph their moves and the swingmeter decides the damage of your attacks. Equip and level up your heroes and take control of the Guardians of Gridvale!

name: Fitness Center Renovator
description: Shape your future with Fitness Center Renovator! Build not only your clients’ muscles but also your unique brand. Create and expand a global fitness center franchise. Renovate old premises, customize them and sell with the profit!

name: Deep Abyss
description: Become a diver yourself to explore the unknown. Take a trip to your deep abyss. Experience a poetic and fantastic world as you explore the deep sea and space.

name: Cordychosis
description: A point-and-click adventure game taking place within a single room. Equipped with some trash and a makeshift time machine, and aided by a neurotic version of yourself from 5 years ago, you must traverse time, collect objects, solve puzzles, befriend a large zombie bee, and escape the madness.

name: Six Shooters
description: Six Shooters is a multiplayer FPS party game of tiny cowboys who cheat at dice. Shoot hot lead and cool powerups to change die rolls and take your luck into your own hands in a variety game modes!

name: Plow the Snow!
description: Fight the cold, plow the snow and rescue Snow Angeles in this arcade 1-4 player co-op experience! Clear the streets, parks, cemeteries, lunaparks and other parts of the city from the effects of The Great Blizzard and become a city hero!

name: Firebird: Legend of the Crystal Goddesses
description: Firebird: Legend of the Crystal Goddesses is a love letter to classic RPGs of the SNES era, inspired by 8-bit and 16-bit classics of the 90's, with some self-aware meta humor for fans of the genre. Come experience a unique fantasy adventure!

name: Detonation Sauce University
description: This is a checkpoint game, you always encounter things on the way to school delay, to the school and was scolded by the teacher, also often encounter campus bullying, can not go on like this, take up arms for their own honor fight, remove all obstacles chasing their own life!

name: Lost Fragments
description: Move between reality and memories, changing the shape of fragments of the past.

name: Constelleum
description: Welcome to Constelleum, the team vs team cosmic fantasy card battler. Pick from characters with distinct styles and mechanics. Play cards to move pawns, disrupt opponents, summon companions, and more. Coordinate with your teammates to drive points to the opposing goal and claim victory.

name: Pixacrea
description: Pixacrea is a creature collecting & battling adventure game where you can get 185 creatures called Pixacrea, or Pixa's for short. In this roguelite game when you lose a battle outside of any major city, or a battle by the group anarchy you're met with a game over page.

name: Hand Shadow
description: Challenge your mind with puzzles that are based on optical illusions. Find the perfect position and angle by rotating the hands until order is restored, and discover a story of protagonist Morgan with professional voicing.

name: Karapath
description: Karapath is a tactical move-to-move-decision-heavy randomized puzzle-thinking rpg-themed game with gambling-based combat.

name: Being and Becoming
description: Being & Becoming is an atmospheric metroidvania, set in a kingdom corrupted by a Collective Dream. Take on the role of the Lucid Dreamer, defeat and consume the souls of the corrupted, then use them as weapons to break the world free from endless slumber.

name: Forbidden Memories
description: Mystical audio quest in find objects style, accessable for the blind. By the fading sound of the metronome, Christina woke up in an abandoned house. Now her task is to get out of there.

name: Gun Knight All Day
description: Gun Knight All Day is a close quarters bullet hell dungeon crawler about a knight who uses guns. Shoot, dodge, and scavenge your way through the procedurally generated dungeons one room at a time. Challenging boss fights test the sharpness of your skills and the lethality of your weapons.

name: Feudums
description: Feudums is a medieval strategy simulation with a detailed player-to-player vassalage system, full modding support and community-driven narrative. Balance diplomatic, economic, and military aspects while making your play for the throne. Is it your destiny to rule?

name: European Football Dynasty 2023
description: In European Football Dynasty, the best clubs from all over Europe are combined in one league-structure. You take over the job as the top manager of a soccer club. Will you manage to lead your club to success - even if your competitors for the title come from Madrid, London, Milan and Munich?

name: Footy Showdown
description: This is the Australian Football game we should have gotten in the SNES era of gaming! Exciting, fun and addictive, play against friends or the CPU. Lead your team to premiership glory with fun but tactical game play innovations never before seen in an Australian Football video game to date!

name: Alienstein
description: Alienstein is a retro inspired FPS with random generated levels and boss fights

name: Idler Coaster
description: Build the ride you want, where you want! Customize your park, upgrade rides and research new attractions to turn your guests into happy customers! Sit back and count your money or click your way to the top!

name: Hospital Renovator
description: Become a one-man renovation company and take care of the reconstruction of a ruined hospital! Save a neglected facility and create a fully functional emergency complex. The entire process of cleaning, planning, repairing, and arranging is on your side. Build a dream clinic in the Hospital Renovator!

name: Halve
description: Help two separated spirits find their way in a vast, puzzle-based fantasy world while simultaneously working together to overcome different challenges and unravel their destiny.

name: Field of Arms: Tactics
description: Field of Arms: Tactics is a strategy game with a unique board game aesthetic, set in the 18th century, recreating battles that occurred during this period of time. Players will have to think strategically in order to defeat the enemy, defend or attack forts during tense battles and sieges.

name: Honeymancer
description: Honeymancer is a cute RPG and Farm Simulator with wave-based combat.Play as a secluded Bear Witch. She's a beekeeper and a user of honey magic.Help your bee friends make honey by planting flowers, use your honey to cast spells and protect the forest from evil robots.

name: Dim Tower
description: Equipped with a "magic lamp", the "Prince" aims to reach the top of the ruined tower in order to find out where he came from with his own "Shadow". What is the reason for the destruction of the "Dim Tower", and what is the true identity of the "Prince"?

name: Darxwift
description: Look for supplies, fight monsters, and try to get out of the infected underground shelter before time runs out!

name: Cyber Chimps
description: You are the puzzle! Help lab-monkeys to escape evil research laboratory. Use your hands to operate monkeys' cybernetic hands. Swing, jump, climb and drag yourself through physics based puzzles and dangers. Can you trust the rogue AI helping you escape...?

name: Post Industrial Renovator
description: Give a second life to old factories by turning them into modern places of art and culture. Accept orders from city authorities and turn old wastelands into museums, cafes, and even parks. Use your skills to create post-industrial treasures in the Post Industrial Renovator.

name: I Believe In Giants
description: Embark on a larger-than-life adventure through the fantastical dream worlds of Astro, a boy filled with endless wonder, to rescue your puppy, Rocket, from the clutches of the Evil Snoozer and his Henchmen. Take on each adventure with a unique form, new abilities and challenges. Sleep tight...

name: Pixel Heroes
description: Pixel Heroes is a new and coming Free-To-Play MMORPG. Explore the unexplored, grow your stats and build allies so you together can defeat the great terrors of Uzoria.

name: Family Is Nothing
description: Explore a vast home in the late 1970's, while being hunted by a mysterious fiend. First-person exploration with no HUD for a more immersive experience.

name: MechaNest
description: Explore Scifi third person action-adventure game MechaNest. City on the planet Merador where the citizens are overthrown by Ai and Mecha's. But be careful MechaNest is full with traps, mazes and vicious Mechanics.

name: Made Beaver
description: Historically accurate fur trade simulator and inventory manager. Build forts, trade with tribes and settlements, ship furs back home for profit.

name: Bartender Simulator
description: Become the bartender and bar owner with Bartender Simulator! Start with a small and little-known bar, expand your business and attract new guests. Serve well-known drinks and create new unique ones, develop your bartending and flair skills. Make you and your bar the best and most famous in the city!

name: Astro Sailor
description: Astro Sailor is a hand-drawn action-adventure game with rogue-like elements and a unique gravity-based movement system. On your journey to explore the galaxy, you’ll meet new friends and foes, discover hidden treasures and face dangerous obstacles.

name: Role of Remains
description: Role of Remains is a story-driven strategic turn-based RPG. We offer you a grandiose atmosphere and a rewarding game experience, featuring a uniquely gloomy and melancholic world view combined with battles full of tension and sense of achievement.

name: Underfoot Queens
description: Underfoot Queens is an ant themed 4x where you will lead your species across generations. Explore, forage for food, expand your colony, fight off competitors, and survive the elements on your path to evolution. In the end, only the most adaptable species will survive.

name: Ozone Wipeout
description: Ozone Wipeout is a post apocalyptic zombie survival game in an endless, procedurally generated open world. Staying alive is your only goal which is much easier said than done. Harsh weather conditions, zombies and resource scarcity are only a few of many things you will have to deal with.

name: Line Hold
description: Top-Down Shooter meets Tower Defense. Build a maze, turrets and barricades. Survive waves of enemies and keep shooting. Level up and unlock new skills and buildings.

name: Police Getaway
description: Feel the thrill of the chase in this adrenaline fueled racing game, where the goal in not to be the first, the goal is to survive! Take on dangerous missions, participate in a number of various side activities or just explore the map looking for trouble... Oh no, it's the cops! Step on it.

name: Circadian
description: Circadian is an engaging retro-style RPG. Defend yourself in turn-based combat with strange and bewildering enemies. Solve puzzles, sniffing out all the strange clues about the small suburban village of Mount Olive. Talk with all the quirky villagers, and seek out some help from your friends!

name: Tale of Witch's Heart
description: When Chaos came, He brought us two blessings. One is your heart. A Witch's Heart. How will you respond to His kindness? Will you carry His will and slay Demons roaming this world, or shall you rebel and abandon your destined path? Will you carry this burden and face lurking threats?

name: Card Tales
description: Make a choice! Collect unusual cards in your hand, use them wisely, and help the fate of the heroes come true.

name: Plead with the Elder Gods
description: A 3D metroidvania adventure in a large, interconnected dark fantasy world. Discover secrets in snowy canyons, lush forests, murky caves and fallen castles. Gain divine abilities, meet peculiar travellers, fight deadly creatures, and make pilgrimage to meet four elder gods.

name: Geranium
description: The story follows the journey of Geranium, a female swordswoman with amnesia.

name: Dreadfire
description: Dreadfire is a thrilling ultraviolent FPS game. Shred your enemies with a large destructive arsenal. Destroy them until none remain. They won't stop until you're dead.

name: Jank Saves the World
description: Do you like beautiful games with jetpack filled action, shooting, rolling, spaceships, and breaking? Jank is no longer following the rules there are too many secrets to uncover for this one robot to work alone.

name: The Phantom Keeper
description: The Phantom Keeper is a monster-collecting RPG adventure where you are a fallen Soul trapped in the land between the living and the dead. Take up the mantle of Keeper to train and care for ghostly creatures known as Phantoms!

name: Hoton
description: Hoton is a horror game with various mechanics that will make you feel fear. Run, hide, survive.

name: Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?!
description: Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?! is a wacky action RPG where YOU'RE the hero! Cook, craft, and toss around epic weapons, barrels of poison, and more as you fulfil your destiny!

name: Anxious Suffering in the Forest
description: Visual novel, multiple endings, lost in a forest inhabited by an evil time witch who bakes magic cookies. Unlock the endings and defeat the witch! (Then play all over again as a dinosaur!)

name: Archrebel: Tactics
description: Archrebel is a sci-fi turn-based strategy war game, strongly inspired by the classic Rebelstar released back in 1986. In Archrebel, players can control a few dozens of units in a grid-based map, performing actions limited by a classic action-point system similar to the one found in the X-COM series.

name: HorrorBox
description: HorrorBox is a Multiplayer Horror Game dripping with an eery cinematic experience set in the 80s. Utilize tools and work together to survive either PvE or PvP fright nights...

name: Agri-Tycoon
description: A throwback to the old school farming simulators where you focus on building and expanding a farm while producing crops and breeding livestock. Keep an eye on your expenses and follow market trends to sell at the right time and become the ultimate agricultural tycoon.

name: Darfall
description: Darfall is a strategy survival city-builder with RPG elements. You lead your hero with a band of warriors to defend your settlement, explore the corrupted land and craft new items. Expand your settlement and defeat the darkness coming from everywhere.

name: Rogue Dice
description: Rogue Dice is a dungeon crawler with dice themed roguelike elements. Choose a hero, enter a dungeon, fill your belt to the brim with powerful dice and find for yourself if luck is on your side, or if the dice will be your doom.

name: City of Rampage
description: City of Rampage is a beat'em up game inspired by such classics as "Streets of Rage" and "Comix Zone", with advanced fighting mechanics and challenging tough bosses. It won't be easy, but beautiful hand drawn visuals and dope soundtracks will make sure you will be coming back for more.

name: Jump Kid
description: The longer you hold your jump, the farther you go! The twist is you'll be unable to use any other key but your jump button to traverse the levels. You'll be faced against enemies, puzzles, and extremely tough tactical platforming to make your way across the many zones and biomes.

name: Candy Boy
description: Being a Candy Boy is never as easy as it looks! Casper woke up one day, intent on making more of his delicious candy, only to find that Candy World had been attacked by ravenous candy-hungry worms. Where did these worms come from? And why do they love candy so much? It doesn't matter! Casper must stop them before they eat his entire world!

name: Angler's World
description: Delve into the relaxing world of fishing with Angler's World, a casual simulator project that lets you recapture some peaceful as well as exciting moments between enjoying your surroundings and noticing the float dip under. Win contests, invest in equipment, discover ever newer fishing challenges.

name: Battle of Decay: Survival
description: Battle of Decay: Survival is a top-down casual survival game that throws you into a world during a virus outbreak. Fight your way through the missions with your friends and get out of hell alive. This game is set in the world of the in-development game 'Battle of Decay'.

name: Automatica
description: Tactical puzzle game where you need to program your robots to finish the task.

name: Foolish Mortals
description: Obsessed with finding the lost treasure of Bellemore Manor, Murphy McCallan encounters ghosts, voodoo, and an evil Phantom who wants the treasure as their own! Eccentric characters and exciting puzzles populate the mysterious island of Devil’s Rock in this classic style point & click adventure.

name: MudGate
description: Explore, survive, and make it home to build a kingdom! As a stranger to yourself in a foreign land, you must explore, improve, and most importantly survive in these unforgiving lands in order to make it home.

name: Dice Guy
description: You are Dice Guy. Evil everyday objects have taken over the world. FARM plastic crops and AUTOMATE factories to refine the plastic into weapons and armor. After arming yourself you will be ready to face a world full of enemies, bosses and secrets...

name: Dutch Maximus: Out of the Toy Box
description: A first person parkour platformer where you play as a child's beloved action figure, as you maneuver through the world with speed. Using wall running, sliding, grappling and other advanced movement to traverse unique and imaginary places.

name: The Outlaw and the Newcomer
description: A suspense ADV of mobsters in Eastern Europe. Walk around the nostalgic city and talk with fascinating characters as you uncover the identity of a terrifying poison. The game system combines elements of exploration, collecting, and visual novels.

name: The Nutcracker
description: A mascot survival horror game where you turn detective and learn the truth about disappearances within a local shopping mall. Evade and outwit the Nutcracker whilst finding out what happened to the missing.

name: Them or Us
description: Them or Us is an Open-World, First Person Tactical Survival Shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world where Soviet and Western civilizations collide on a chain of fictional islands in the Bering Sea.

name: Upheaveal
description: Enter Upheaveal! Play as one of several representatives of alien races and a variety of different objects in your environment to KO your opponents. Aim to be the last one standing in this physics-based 3D multiplayer party game! Throw everything, become Champion, and cause Upheaveal!

name: My Wife is a Princess
description: A traitor appeared in the kingdom, and the seal of the demon king was lifted. In order to save the kingdom~the beautiful queen sent a rescue request to the brave...The price was to become the wife of the brave!

name: Neverland
description: Neverland is a co-op horror open world; join with your friends or explore alone the dark secrets of a once called paradise. Uncover the mysteryes of the forgotten island, help your teammates or leave them to their luck...

name: New Town Needs Tamer
description: Become a champion tamer for a newly formed town, full of people eager to meet you.

name: Night Castle
description: Night Castle is an "RPG" game. Explore a huge castle, learn powerful spells, fight terrible creatures, uncover ancient secrets ...

name: Night of the Wererat
description: A cheesy short horror game where you play as an exterminator on a dark and rainy night. The house has rats within its walls, but what if something more sinister lies deep within the home? Survive and complete your job, or face down the wrath of the wererat!

name: Nitro Back
description: Low poly pixel art racing game with arcade mechanics!

name: Noir Storm
description: Take on the role of a private detective who, intercepted by a MOSSAD spy on the city of Buenos Aires in 1952, is drawn into a dangerous odyssey against exiles from the Third Reich and the inminent threat of a new and unprecedented weapon of mass destruction.

name: One More Dream
description: A linear horror experience taking place in a dream or a memory.

name: Offroad Delivery Service
description: A courier and an off-road simulator rolled into one, where you are faced with an arduous task of delivering cargo of various sizes to distant and hard-to-reach places. Get contracts, earn money, upgrade your equipment and SUV.

name: Offline
description: A story-driven quest in which the setting plays a key role. Pay attention to detail and look for connections, ask yourself questions, and never forget the bigger picture, learning to read the symbolism that surrounds you. Are you playing?

name: Oblivion Eclipse
description: Oblivion Eclipse is open world souls-like action RPG platformer. Vast world, slick combat, fun movement. Slash through gods as you platform your way through a breathtaking world on an unforgettable adventure.

name: Nysunder
description: Nysunder is a true hardcore, open world, FPS. It brings realistic gunplay mechanics & in-depth survival features into one package, to create intense combat. Leave your mark in the world by joining several unique factions, or simply go off-grid with your camper van. The choice is yours!

name: Novi Cube
description: Casual + Old-School + Roguelike = Novi Cube! Shoot dozens of projectiles at evil geometric shapes to finally satisfy that itch to kill geometric shapes that we all have since we had to calculate weird shapes and forms! Calculating areas of squares is boring! Novi Cube is fun²!

name: Not Alone: Remake
description: NOTALONE is a single-player horror simulator in which you play the role of 45-year-old Mortie Jones. You learn that your mother is dead and your father is missing. Your task will be to spend the night in your old family home.

name: North of Nowhere
description: Settle a new land of monsters and mystery, alone or with friends and family in this Real-Time Life Sim!

name: Northern Kingdoms
description: In this addictive city-builder game, your job is to guide your citizens to create the ultimate buzzing city. Expand your city, keep your citizen feed and plan your way to victory.
